question:
Question: Navigation Instruction given at initial position: [take of from the sea and take left there was an golden building and go to the top of the building and go straight. there was an another building and then take left from the building then go straight for a while. go straight for a while there was a sea at the end of the building then take then take left from the building, again take right. again take right from the building then take a turn from the building, then land near the building is our final destination.]. At the initial position, you are asked to move according to a series of movement instructions. What are you doing now?  
choose:  
A. I obtain from the sea.  
B. I turn left from the building.  
C. I turn right from the building.  
D. I turn right at the building.  
E. I go up the tall building.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: E; Reason: The sequence of images shows a progression from an open area near the sea to approaching and then ascending a tall building. The final frames depict a view from the top of a building, indicating that the agent has gone up the tall building as per the navigation instruction.
textgrad_result.evaluation:
Location: [(0, 36)]
Option: [E]
Reason: The video shows the agent starting near the sea (0-3s), then moving towards and up a tall building (3-32s). The final frames (32-36s) show a view from the top of the building, indicating the agent has gone up the tall building. Therefore, the answer is E.
textgrad_result.final_answer: Option: E; Reason: The sequence of images shows a progression from an open area near the sea to approaching and then ascending a tall building. The final frames depict a view from the top of a building, indicating that the agent has gone up the tall building as per the navigation instruction.
